page.title: 06JAPANESE COMPUTER INDUSTRY
page.content: THE{NIPPON ELECTRIC COMPANY}(N.E.C. SEMI-CONDUCTORS)IS THE ONLY FACTORY OF ITS KIND IN BRITAIN AND EUROPE.IT WAS OPENED IN{AUGUST 1982}BY THE QUEEN.IT WAS DECIDED TO BUILD THE FACTORY HERE BECAUSE OF THE GOOD REPUTATION THAT THE CENTRAL BELT OF SCOTLAND HAD HAD IN THE{ELECTRONIC INDUSTRY.}THE AREA IS OFTEN REFERRED TO AS{SILICONE {VALLEY}.N.E.C.PRODUCES{SEMI-CONDUCTORS FOR THE MICRO ELECTRONIC FIRMS.IT MAKES SILICONE CHIPS USED IN COMPUTERS,WATCHES,KETTLES ETC THE SILICONE CHIPS ARE EXPORTED TO EUROPE. WHEN THE N.E.C.OPENED THERE WERE 15 EMPLOYEES,NOW THERE ARE 250 AND THE FACTORY IS BEING EXPANDED TO EMPLOY 650 PEOPLE.MOST OF THE EMPLOYEES ARE YOUNG,LOCAL PEOPLE.THERE ARE SOME JAPANESE WORKERS WHO COME FOR A SHORT TIME TO TRAIN THE WORKFORCE.THE FACTORY USES{SOPHISTICATED EQUIPTMENT.
